articles.title: Toyota Canada ‘gets together’ with Dallas Green (City and Colour) to launch the Canadian-Built all-new, all-hybrid 2026 RAV4
articles.description: TORONTO, February 4, 2026 – Toyota Canada has just launched a new national campaign celebrating connection, recreation and the Canadian-built All-new, all-hybrid 2026 Toyota RAV4.

articles.title: Toyota Canada Releases January Sales Results
articles.description: Numerous hybrid, plug-in hybrid and battery-electric nameplates set January records

articles.title: Toyota starts Canadian production of the all-new 6th generation RAV4
articles.description: WOODSTOCK, January 23, 2026 – Toyota Motor Manufacturing Canada (TMMC) has started producing the all-new 6th generation RAV4 for the North American market.

articles.title: Record electrified vehicle sales power Toyota Canada Inc. to record sales in 2025
articles.description: RAV4 continues to be Canada’s best-selling passenger vehicle

articles.title: Toyota Canada Releases November Sales Results
articles.description: TORONTO, December 2, 2025 – Toyota Canada Inc. (TCI) sales reached an all-time November record with 20,740 units sold, up 12.3% YOY, helped by strong demand for its electrified vehicles.
